admin_templates.template:
{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tag_confirm_deletion} {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tag_confirm_deletion}

{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_please_confirm_delete_empty_tags}
• {xen:phrase default} ({xen:if '{xen:helper Tinhte_XenTag_getOption, requiresTag} > 0', '{xen:phrase yes}', '{xen:phrase no}'}) {xen:phrase yes} {xen:phrase no}

<!-- [Tinhte] XenTag / Mark --><!-- slot: after_description --><!-- [Tinhte] XenTag / Mark --> <xen:textboxunit name="tinhte_xentag_tags_text" value="{xen:helper Tinhte_Xentag_getImplodedTagsFromPage, $page}" label="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tags}:" explain="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tags_instruction}" inputclass="Elastic AutoComplete" data-acUrl="{xen:link 'tags/find'}"> </xen:textboxunit> <input type="hidden" name="tinhte_xentag_included" value="1" />

{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tag_confirm_deletion}: {$tag.tag_text} {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tag_confirm_deletion} {$tag.tag_text}

{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tag_please_confirm}:

{$tag.tag_text}

<xen:title>{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tag_edit}: {$tag.tag_text}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:adminlink xentag-tags}#{xen:helper listitemid, $tag.tag_id}">{$tag.tag_text}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<xen:form action="{xen:adminlink 'xentag-tags/edit', $tag}">
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tag_text}:" name="tag_text" value="{$tag.tag_text}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tag_text_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tag_title}:" name="tag_title" value="{$tag.tag_title}" />
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tag_description}:" name="tag_description" value="{$tag.tag_description}" rows="5" inputclass="Elastic"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tag_description_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase link}:" name="link" value="{$tagLink}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_link_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<xen:checkboxunit label="" explain="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_is_staff_explain}"> <xen:option name="is_staff" value="1" selected="{$tag.is_staff}">{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_is_staff}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>
<input type="hidden" name="tag_id" value="{$tag.tag_id}" /> <input type="hidden" name="_xfConfirm" value="1" />
<xen:submitunit save="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tag_save}"> <input type="button" value="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tag_delete}" accesskey="d" class="button OverlayTrigger" data-href="{xen:adminlink xentag-tags/delete, $tag}" /> </xen:submitunit> </xen:form>

{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tags} {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_delete_empty_tags}

{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tags}

{xen:phrase showing_x_of_y_items, 'count={xen:count $tags}', 'total={xen:number $total}'}

{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tag_no_results}
 {xen:adminpagenav $perPage, $total, $page, 'xentag-tags'}
{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tagged_contents}
{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_rebuild_tag_information}

<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, 5}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase wf_threads}"}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="{$namePrefix}as_guest" value="1" selected="{$options.as_guest}">{xen:phrase wf_use_guest_permissions}</xen:option> <xen:option name="{$namePrefix}use_live_cache" value="1" selected="{$options.use_live_cache}">{xen:phrase wf_use_live_cache}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>

<xen:textboxunit label="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tags}:" name="{$namePrefix}tags" value="{$options.tags}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tagged_threads_tags_explain}</xen:explain> </xen:textboxunit>
<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, 5}"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase wf_threads}"} {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tagged_threads_limit_explain, 'limit={xen:helper Tinhte_XenTag_getOption, latestTaggedContentsLimit}'}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>
<xen:checkboxunit label=""> <xen:option name="{$namePrefix}as_guest" value="1" selected="{$options.as_guest}">{xen:phrase wf_use_guest_permissions}</xen:option> </xen:checkboxunit>

<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_trending_days}:" name="{$namePrefix}days" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.days})', $options.days, $xenOptions.Tinhte_XenTag_trendingDays}" min="1" step="7" /> <xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_created_days}:" name="{$namePrefix}created_days" value="{$options.created_days}" min="0" step="7" explain="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_created_days_explain}" />
<xen:spinboxunit label="{xen:phrase wf_limit}:" name="{$namePrefix}limit" value="{xen:if '!empty({$options.limit})', $options.limit, $xenOptions.Tinhte_XenTag_trendingMax}" min="1" step="5"> <xen:explain>{xen:phrase wf_limit_explain, "items={xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tags_lowercase}"}</xen:explain> </xen:spinboxunit>

<xen:selectunit label="{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_widget_trending_thread_tags_forums}:" name="{$namePrefix}forums" value="" size="5" multiple="true" inputclass="textCtrl"> <xen:options source="$forums" /> </xen:selectunit>
<xen:include template="tinhte_xentag_widget_trending_options" />

template.title: tinhte_xentag_watch_tag_post
template.subject:
<xen:if is="{$contentData.position} == 0">
{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_new_tagged_thread_x, "title={$contentData.titleCensored}"}
<xen:else />
{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_new_tagged_reply_in_thread_x, "title={$contentData.titleCensored}"}
</xen:if>
template.body_html:
{$receiver.username}, {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_x_tagged_thread_y, 'name={$contentData.username}', 'title={xen:helper threadPrefix, $contentData, plain}{$contentData.title}'} {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_x_tagged_reply_thread_y, 'name={$contentData.username}', 'title={xen:helper threadPrefix, $contentData, plain}{$contentData.title}'}

 
{xen:raw $contentData.messageHtml}
{xen:phrase view_this_thread} {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_watched_tags}

{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_watch_tag_email_footer_1, 'tag_text={$tag.tag_text}', 'board_title={$xenOptions.boardTitle}'}

{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_watch_tag_email_footer_2_html, 'disable_this_link={xen:link canonical:watched/via-email, '', 'u={$receiver.user_id}', 'c={$receiver.email_confirm_key}', 'a=no_email', 't=tag', 'id={$tag.tag_id}'}', 'disable_all_link={xen:link canonical:watched/via-email, '', 'u={$receiver.user_id}', 'c={$receiver.email_confirm_key}', 'a=no_email'}', 'link_style=color: #969696', 'board_link={xen:link 'canonical:index'}', 'board_title={$xenOptions.boardTitle}'}

template.title: tinhte_xentag_watch_tag_resource_update
template.subject: {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_new_tagged_resource_x, "title={$contentData.titleCensored}"}
template.body_html:
{$receiver.username}, {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_x_tagged_resource_y, 'name={$contentData.username}', 'title={xen:helper resourcePrefix, $contentData, plain}{$contentData.title}'}

 
{xen:raw $contentData.messageHtml}
{xen:phrase view_this_resource} {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_watched_tags}

{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_watch_tag_email_footer_1, 'tag_text={$tag.tag_text}', 'board_title={$xenOptions.boardTitle}'}

{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_watch_tag_email_footer_2_html, 'disable_this_link={xen:link canonical:watched/via-email, '', 'u={$receiver.user_id}', 'c={$receiver.email_confirm_key}', 'a=no_email', 't=tag', 'id={$tag.tag_id}'}', 'disable_all_link={xen:link canonical:watched/via-email, '', 'u={$receiver.user_id}', 'c={$receiver.email_confirm_key}', 'a=no_email'}', 'link_style=color: #969696', 'board_link={xen:link 'canonical:index'}', 'board_title={$xenOptions.boardTitle}'}

phrases.phrase: Enter the maximum number of tags should be process when the mode is set to use all tags. To remove limitation, enter 0 (zero) in this option.
Select the mode for auto tagging feature in thread.
Enable this option to auto tag each tag once in a piece of content.
Select the mode for auto tagging feature in resource.
Display position in resource view. The tag will be displayed in the specified place only.
Display position in thread view. The tag will be displayed in the specified place only.
If your tags use special characters and the links don't work properly, switch to the second format.
Open Tag Link in New Window
Enable this option to open the tag page in a new window (or browser tab, if available).
Enter the display order to prioritize forums in tagged content listing. The higher the value, the higher forums will showup in the list. Enter 0 to disable this feature.
Enter the display order to prioritize pages in tagged content listing. The higher the value, the higher pages will showup in the list. Enter 0 to disable this feature.
Enter the display order to prioritize resources in tagged content listing. The higher the value, the higher forums will showup in the list. Enter 0 to disable this feature.
Select "Yes" to require at least one tag in a new thread. This option can be overridden in individual forum by updating its option to override global setting.
Select "Yes" to require at least one tag in a new resource.
Different search engine may cause problem with tag, you can experiment different modes here to choose which works best for your site. You MUST rebuild the search index after changing this option.
You can set the maximum tag length here. There is a hard limitation of 100, you can't exceed it (the database can only hold a maximum of 100 characters).
You can set the minimum tag length here.
Select "Yes" to set all #hashtags of the first post as tags for the thread.
Only content tagged within specified number of days will be taken into account when Trending is calculated.
Enter how often (in days) the trending tags should be calculated.

Enable this option to allow user to use #hashtag in posts. With #hashtag feature enable, you can prohibit some users from using it by configuring the user group permission "[XenTag] Max #hashtags per post".
Enable this option to show a small icon for the tag link. The icon must be placed in the image path defined by the style. To be exact: @imagePath/Tinhte/XenTag/tag.png.
These are all contents from {board_title} tagged {tag_text}.
Auto tag the first post with thread tags only
If entered, only tags that was created recently will be included.
Check this box to delete the tag. All tagged contents will be updated to remove reference to this tag. This action cannot be undone.
You can override global setting for this forum here. Set the maximum tags can be tagged in a thread. Set to 0 (zero) to have no limit.
You can override global setting for this forum here. Select Yes to requires at least one tag in a new thread.
Only members of user groups with the permission "[XenTag] Use staff-only tags" can use staff tag in their contents. Everyone can view it.
If entered, user will be redirected to the specified link when he/she views tagged contents listing.
You are not allowed to use hashtags.
Please confirm that you want to delete ALL empty tags (without any contents tagged).
Please enter a reason for reporting this tag.
The resource must be tagged with at least one tag.

Please note that there is a hard limit for each tag: only {limit} latest tagged contents is saved. In order to maintain good performance, this widget will only use that information (instead of querying the xf_tinhte_xentag_tagged_content table directly).
The list of tags separated by comma. Only threads that has been tagged with specified tags will show up.
Enter list of tags, separated by comma.
Tag can not be longer than {maxLength} characters.
User with edit permission may change the description from the front-end.
Tag must be at least {minLength} characters in length.
The requested Tag could not be found
Tag must not contain censored texts.
No clues of Tag at this moment...
Please confirm that you want to delete the following tag
The tag text that will be used and referenced throughout the system. It's not recommended to change this because it may break URLs or render strange search behaviors among other things.
Thank you for reporting this tag.
These are the {count} most used tags.
This is a list of all the tags that you are watching.
This is the message they posted
This is the resource they posted
The thread must be tagged with at least one tag.
{count} hashtags have been used: {tagTexts}. Only {maximum} allowed.
{count} tags have been used; only {maximum} tags allowed.
To view this resource, click here
To view this thread, click here
This message was sent to you because you opted to watch the tag "{tag_text}" at {board_title} with email notification of new contents.
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, you may disable emails from this tag or disable all emails.
{name} tagged a reply to the thread {title} with a tag you are watching.
{name} tagged the resource {title} with a tag you are watching.
{name} tagged a thread called {title} with a tag you are watching.
Sorry, you do not have the permission to create new tag. Please use existing tags only.
You are not watching any tags.
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for all tags?
Are you sure you want to update your email notification settings for one tag?

property.title: Show Icon in Tag Link
property.description: Enable this option to show a small icon for the tag link. The icon must be placed in the image path defined by the style. To be exact: @imagePath/Tinhte/XenTag/tag.png.

templates.template: {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_x_tagged_thread_y, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'title={xen:helper threadPrefix, $content}{$content.title}'} {xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_x_tagged_reply_thread_y, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'title={xen:helper threadPrefix, $content}{$content.title}'}
#{$displayText}
{$displayText}

Please do not remove this copyright notice. Thank you.
XenTag by Tinhte.vn
<xen:if is="{$showWysiwyg}"> <xen:require css="tinhte_xentag.css" /> <xen:require js="js/Tinhte/XenTag/bb_code_edit.js" /> </xen:if>
{xen:phrase tinhte_xentag_tags}: {xen:helper Tinhte_XenTag_getImplodedTagsFromForum, $forum, 1}
The usage of $post is is a bug of XenForo (`message` template) I think.

<xen:if is="{xen:helper Tinhte_XenTag_getOption, 'displayPosition'} == 'post_message_below'"> <xen:include template="tinhte_xentag_tags_in_post"> <xen:map from="$message" to="$post" /> </xen:include> </xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:helper Tinhte_XenTag_getOption, 'displayPosition'} == 'post_message_above'"> <xen:include template="tinhte_xentag_tags_in_post"> <xen:map from="$message" to="$post" /> </xen:include> </xen:if>

<xen:if is="{xen:helper Tinhte_XenTag_getOption, 'displayPosition'} == 'thread_pagenav_above'"> <xen:include template="tinhte_xentag_tags_thread_view" /> </xen:if>
<xen:if is="{xen:helper Tinhte_XenTag_getOption, 'displayPosition'} == 'thread_qr_below'"> <xen:include template="tinhte_xentag_tags_thread_view" /> </xen:if>
<xen:if is="{xen:helper Tinhte_XenTag_getOption, 'displayPosition'} == 'thread_qr_above'"> <xen:include template="tinhte_xentag_tags_thread_view" /> </xen:if>
